imdb.plot outline: After performing the Rite of Penance, Jim is startled when a chair flies across the room. He reaches out to his Priest, Papa Gumpta Goomp. Papa deduces a demon is haunting Jim and calls for a cleansing. During the exorcism, we get a glimpse of Jim's past. Jim, a former atheist, became religious when Papa rescued him from a cycle of addiction and self-abuse. The exorcism concludes with Papa violating Jim with an ice cream cone. Jim asks his sister, Charlene, to have a private investigator look into Papa's past. Upon discovering Jim's betrayal, Papa traps Jim inside a magical snow globe for seven years. When Jim finally emerges, he accepts his duty to his Father and Lord. Wearing a homemade bomb under his trench coat, Jim walks into a Cold Stone Creamery and detonates the device.
imdb.title: The Almighty O
plot: Jim, a recovering addict, seeks solace and salvation in his newfound devotion to the Almighty O. His priest, however, may not have Jim's best interests in mind.

After performing the Rite of Penance, Jim is startled when a chair flies across the room. He reaches out to his Priest, Papa Gumpta Goomp. Papa deduces a demon is haunting Jim and calls for a cleansing. During the exorcism, we get a glimpse of Jim's past. Jim, a former atheist, became religious when Papa rescued him from a cycle of addiction and self-abuse. The exorcism concludes with Papa violating Jim with an ice cream cone. Jim asks his sister, Charlene, to have a private investigator look into Papa's past. Upon discovering Jim's betrayal, Papa traps Jim inside a magical snow globe for seven years. When Jim finally emerges, he accepts his duty to his Father and Lord. Wearing a homemade bomb under his trench coat, Jim walks into a Cold Stone Creamery and detonates the device.
